'''"Sorry to Keep You Waiting, Dear Archon"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Sorry to Keep You Waiting, Dear Archon" is obtained from the [[Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses]] Event.
